tasks.check: deno check src/codefactory/mod.ts && deno check src/mcp-server/server.ts && deno check src/cli/main.ts
tasks.publish:check: cd src/codefactory && deno publish --dry-run && cd ../mcp-server && deno publish --dry-run && cd ../cli && deno publish --dry-run
tasks.build:cli: deno compile --include src/cli/templates --include src/mcp-server --include src/codefactory/factories --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-run --output=dist/codefactory src/cli/main.ts
tasks.install:local: deno task build:cli && mkdir -p ~/bin && cp dist/codefactory.exe ~/bin/codefactory.exe && echo 'Add ~/bin to PATH if not already there'
